rukus.text: 2|153|Xindao de renmen a! Nimen dang jie jianren he bai gong er qiu youzhu. An la que shi yu jianren zhe tong zai de.
2|154|Wei zhu dao er bei qianghai de ren, nimen buyao shuo tamen shi si de; qishi, tamen shi huo de, dan nimen bu zhijue.
2|155|Wo bi yi xiewei de kongbu he jijin, yiji zichan, shengming, shouhuo deng de sunshi, shiyan nimen, ni dang xiang jianren de ren baoxi.
2|156|Tamen zaonan de shihou, shuo:“Women que shi an la suoyou de, women biding zhi guiyi ta.”
2|157|Zhe deng ren, shi meng an la de hu you he ci en de; zhe deng ren, que shi zunxun zhengdao de.

2|158|Sai fa he mai er wei, que shi an la de biaozhi. Juxing da chao he xiao chao de ren, wufang you ci liang shan. Ziyuan xingshan zhe,(bidei shan bao), yin wei an la que shi hou bao de, que shi quanzhi de.
2|159|Wo zai jingdian zhong wei shiren chanmingzhengdao zhihou, yinhui wo suo jiang shi de ming zheng he zhengdao de ren, an la qi jue tamen; yiban zuzhou zhe, dou zuzhou tamen.
2|160|Wei huizui zi xin, chanming zhenli de ren, wo jiang she you tamen. Wo shi zhi you de, shi zhi ci de.
2|161|Zhongshen bu xindao, lin si hai bu xindao de ren, bi shou an la de qi jue, bi shou tianshi he renlei quanti de zuzhou.
2|162|Tamen jiang yong ju huo yu, bu meng jianxing, bu huo kuanxian.
2|163|Nimen suo dang chongbai de, shi weiyi de zhuzai; chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de; ta shi zhiren de, shi zhi ci de.
